targets.query: uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: jobSummary AND jobConfig.name :network-policy-perf
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: "nodeCPU-Masters" AND NOT labels.mode.keyword: idle AND NOT labels.mode.keyword: steal
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: nodeCPU-Masters AND NOT labels.mode.keyword: idle AND NOT labels.mode.keyword: steal
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: "containerCPU" AND labels.container.keyword: kube-apiserver

uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: "containerCPU-Masters" AND labels.container.keyword: kube-controller-manager
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: "containerMemory-Masters" AND labels.container.keyword: kube-controller-manager

uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerMemory" AND labels.container.keyword: kube-scheduler
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerCPU-Masters" AND labels.container.keyword: kube-scheduler
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerMemory-Masters" AND labels.container.keyword: kube-scheduler
uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerCPU" AND labels.namespace.keyword: "openshift-ovn-kubernetes" AND labels.pod.keyword: /ovnkube-node.*/

uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName: "containerCPU" AND labels.namespace.keyword: "openshift-ovn-kubernetes"  AND labels.pod.keyword: /ovnkube-node.*/ AND labels.container.keyword: "ovnkube-controller"

uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: containerCPU* AND labels.container.keyword: etcd

panels.description: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{apiserver="kube-apiserver", verb=~"LIST|GET", subresource!~"log|exec|portforward|attach|proxy"}[2m])) by (le, resource, verb, scope))

targets.query: uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: readOnlyAPICallsLatency AND labels.scope.keyword: resource

panels.title: Read Only API request P99 latency - resource scoped

panels.description: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{apiserver="kube-apiserver", verb=~"LIST|GET", subresource!~"log|exec|portforward|attach|proxy"}[2m])) by (le, resource, verb, scope))

targets.query: uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: readOnlyAPICallsLatency AND labels.scope.keyword: namespace

panels.title: Read Only API request P99 latency - namespace scoped

panels.description: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{apiserver="kube-apiserver", verb=~"LIST|GET", subresource!~"log|exec|portforward|attach|proxy"}[2m])) by (le, resource, verb, scope))

targets.query: uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: readOnlyAPICallsLatency AND labels.scope.keyword: cluster

panels.title: Read Only API request P99 latency - cluster scoped

panels.description: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{apiserver="kube-apiserver", verb=~"POST|PUT|DELETE|PATCH", subresource!~"log|exec|portforward|attach|proxy"}[2m])) by (le, resource, verb, scope))
panels.title: Mutating API request P99 latency
Top 5 Kubelet process by CPU usage
Top 5 CRI-O process by CPU usage
Top 5 Kubelet RSS by memory usage
Top 5 CRI-O RSS by memory usage

targets.query: uuid.keyword: $uuid AND metricName.keyword: containerMemory AND labels.node.keyword: $worker

panels.title: Aggregated worker nodes usage (only in aggregated metrics profile)

list.definition: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword", "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: master AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}
list.label: Master nodes
list.name: master
list.query: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword", "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: master AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}

list.definition: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword", "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: worker AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}
list.label: Worker nodes
list.name: worker
list.query: { "find" : "terms", "field": "labels.node.keyword", "query": "metricName.keyword: nodeRoles AND labels.role.keyword: worker AND uuid.keyword: $uuid"}
